text.body:
Mr Kwesi Nyantakyi
President of the Ghana Football Association
Protea Hotel
Braamfontein
On the historic occasion of the first FIFA World Cup to be hosted in Africa, it is a great pleasure to see that Ghana has reached the quarter finals. We join everybody on the continent and in the diaspora in wishing you success in the tournament going forward.
Yours sincerely
NR Mandela
